payment_processor_name.description: Indicates the active payment processor whose configuration will be used for ACH payments made from the account.

repay_config.description: Sensitive bank information will be stored as a secured token for payments in place of the raw account details.

repay_check_type.description: Type of checking account: Personal or Business.

repay_account_type.description: Type of account: Savings or Checking.

repay_transit_number.description: Transit number is a nine-digit code based on the U.S. Bank location where your account was opened.

repay_account_number.description: Account number is an eight to ten digit number that identifies a specific account.

repay_name_on_check.description: Account holder's name as it appears on the account.

payment_processor_name.description: Indicates the active payment processor whose configuration will be used for payments made from the account. If `NONE`, Canopy will not trigger payments to an external payment processor when they occur.

repay_config.description: Sensitive debit card information will be stored as a secured token for payments in place of the raw account details.

repay_exp_date.description: The card expiration date in the format MMYY.

repay_name_on_card.description: The card holder's name as it appears on the card.

repay_street.description: The card holder's billing street address.

repay_zip.description: The card holder's billing zip code.

autopay_enabled.description: Indicates whether autopay is enabled for this account. Currently, autopay is triggered 1 day prior to a payment due date. If `default_payment_processor` is set to `NONE`, autopay will not be triggered for account regardless of this field's value.

default_payment_processor_method.description: Configures the payment processor to be used for manual or autopay payments. This cannot be set to a value different from `NONE` if no valid ACH or Debit Card configs are provided.
